mapper.update: update tb_consumer t set t.name =#{name}, t.phone=#{phone}, t.nick_name =#{nickName}, t.img = #{img}, t.province =#{province}, t.city =#{city} where t.id=#{userid}

update tb_consumer c set c.is_agent=#{isAgent}, c.name=#{name}, c.phone=#{phone}, c.commpay_name=#{commpayName}, c.agent_province=#{agentProvince}, c.agent_city=#{agentCity}, c.agent_district=#{agentDistrict}, c.agent_address=#{agentAddress}, c.trading_img=#{tradingImg} where c.id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from tb_consumer c where c.id = #{id}
